1.Title: Chess
1.ShortDescription: Classic chess game made for teaching, studying or just playing a game with someone at your side. Programmed from 0 using simply Javascript, HTML and CSS (logic from zero, no external libraries, except for Google Fonts)
1.ProjectDescription1: A chess game created from scratch with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. For this project, I decided to manipulate the DOM using JavaScript as my primary strategy and use only HTML and CSS, as the goal was to demonstrate my knowledge of JavaScript and my programming logic.
1.ProjectDescription2: To achieve this, I have used functions, classes, objects, events and, of course, conditionals and loops, to achieve a fully functional chess game.

2.Title: Traveling-app
2.ShortDescription: Website that offers users different tourist destinations for their next holidays. Made in NextJS 15 and with dependencies on React 19, leaflet, next-intl, nodemailer and lqip, among others.
2.ProjectDescription1: Website built in Nextjs 15 and React 19 applying multiple functionalities offered by these frameworks, in addition to relying on some external libraries
2.ProjectDescription2: The project consists of multiple components (both client and server), hooks and APIs to improve the scalability of the project and the overall performance of the website
2.ProjectDescription3: It also uses a small middleware that redirects the user based on their language preferences and also prevents a user from making many requests to the server (trying to avoid potential problems due to server overload)
2.ProjectDescription4: Among the main dependencies of the project we have:
2.DependencyList1: Library used to display locations → leaflet
2.DependencyList2: Library used to optimize images → lqip-modern
2.DependencyList3: Library used to manage languages → next-intl
2.DependencyList4: Library used to contact email → nodemailer

AboutMyself.Title: Background
AboutMyself.Description: Programming since 2021, I have developed several applications, both web and desktop, in different programming languages according to the needs of the moment
AboutMyself.Description2: In 2022 I started the Higher Vocational Training in Web Application Development, finishing it in 2024, having expanded my knowledge of web development much further in the process and applying this knowledge to my work
AboutMyself.Description3: When I finished the training cycle, the company where I did my internship decided to keep me because they were very happy with my work during the internship period and, honestly, I couldn't be more grateful for this opportunity
AboutMyself.Description4: And so we come to today, where I am looking for new challenges to continue growing professionally
